```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
weight1 <- import(here("data", "sesdata.rds"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(weight1, aes(x = BMI, y = SES, color = weight_perception)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, alpha = 0.5) +
  xlim(NA, 50) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "BMI", y = "SES", color = "Weight Perception")
```
